title: if you have dual sim cards and reach data limit on one can you switch to the other and reset to 0gb?
content: I reached my 22gb limit on Google Fi so I have reduced speed now. I went to switch over to my TMobile data expecting to be at 0 but it still says I'm at 22.3. wouldn't I be going off a different plan though?
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
